title: Submit a Level
tooltip: Unknown difficulty, will submit but please make sure it's readable by the managers. Correct diff ex.: G13; P7~P13; 21.1+; 19~20.0+

alert.login: Please log in to submit a level
alert.form: Please fill in all required fields correctly
alert.invalidZip: Please upload a valid zip file

warnings.pendingProfiles: The following profiles will be created:

validation.needDownloadLink: Please provide either a download link or workshop link
validation.needCharter: At least one charter is required

cdnTos.title: CDN Upload Confirmation
cdnTos.content: Before uploading your level to the CDN, please confirm that your zip file meets all requirements specified in our
cdnTos.confirmation: I confirm that my level zip file:

terms.1: Contains only original content or content I have permission to use and distribute
terms.2: Does not contain any malicious or harmful content
